taskDescription:
Provide examples of existing texts of a particular genre in your mother tongue, such as press articles o cooking recipes, to illustrate the structure and style guidelines suggested in Module 4.

  • Short and simple sentences.
  • Complete sentences.

  • Active voice.
  • Homogenous style.
  • Use simple verb tense forms.
  • Avoid concatenated verbs.
